item.description:
Photo Walk: Tower Hill Botanic Garden

May 31 - Tower Hill Botanic Gardens Join Scott Erb for a photo walk around the distinctive gardens of Tower Hill. The array of outstanding plants, beautiful landscaping, and wildlife create a wide range of choices for taking stunning photographs.

Scott Erb will guide the walks and answer photography questions along the way. The routes will be short enough to provide plenty of time for shooting and exploring. Conclude each session with informal photo sharing and receive the link to a dedicated Flickr group to post and share your favorite photos! Bring your camera, photo equipment, sunscreen, water, and a snack, and dress comfortably.

CEUs: 3.00 Hours: 3.00
Please Note: If students sign up for all 3 workshops, apply series discount in #3!


There are still openings remaining at this time.

Please Tell a Friend about this Photo Walk

Instructor: Scott Erb

Code Begins Ends Meets Fee
10SAPHT317B 05/31/2010 05/31/2010 Monday from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM, 1 Session 50.00
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the gate at 2PM!
